title: The stress-relieving darling of the internet is on sale (ships internationally) - Android Authority
text:
by AA Picks 11 seconds ago 
The AAPicks team writes about things we think you’ll like, and we may see a share of revenue from any purchases made through affiliate links. 
Unless you’ve been living under rock recently, you’ve probably seen this humble gadget making its way through product lists and unboxing videos. 
It’s designed to stop your fidgeting by keeping your fingers busy with a variety of clickers, switches, and satisfying tactile sensations. Stress Block is a surprisingly addictive little desk toy. 
Each of the cube’s six sides offers a different micro-playground built to relieve negative, pent-up energy. 
Some of the activities are silent, making them perfect for constructive fidgeting when you need to pay attention to something. Others offer delicious pops and clicks for auditory feedback. 

And since the Stress Block is small enough to fit into your pocket, you’ve got fidget-relief at your fingertips anywhere you go! 
(From personal experience, it’s also great for writer’s block.) 
Normally these well-constructed little gizmos would run you $24, but for a limited time you can grab on for just $14.99 from Tech Deals. If you have a friend who you think might want one, then you can knock an additional $10 off that figure by recommending them! 
In a nutshell, if you snag this offer while it’s live and take advantage of the referral feature, a Stress Block can be yours for $4.99. 
Assuming you get the $10 for the referral, that’s 76 percent off in savings. Not too shabby! Buy it! In disclosure, we may get a percent kickback from purchases made through affiliates. However, the AA Picks team only spotlights verified, legitimate deals. It’s a nice way to help keep the lights on around here, and it decreases our reliance on pesky ads. If you have questions or concerns, please reach out at [email protected] .
